text: Tennessee State University is a university in Nashville, Tennessee. It is a historically black university, which means that it was founded to educate African American students. The university opened in 1909. Its name, "Tennessee State University" was first used in 1968. Category:Historically black colleges and universities Category:1909 establishments in the United States Category:20th-century establishments in Tennessee Category:Colleges and universities in Nashville, Tennessee
title: Tennessee State University
